attributes.action: show the appreciation deserved for one of the countries best ever boxers, Joe Calzaghe, by recommending him for a knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned feel it is appropriate to fully recognise the extent of the talent, dignity and determination of one Joe Calzaghe, as one of the best boxers this country has ever produced, by awarding him a knighthood for his outstanding acheivements in boxing and also awarding his father, Enzo Calzaghe, a MBE.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
